Emerging growth company&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#9744; &#160; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#9744; Table of Contents TABLE OF CONTENTS &#160; ITEM&#160;5.03.&#160;&#160;AMENDMENTS TO ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION OR BYLAWS; CHANGE IN FISCAL YEAR. &#160;&#160; &#160; 3 &#160; ITEM&#160;9.01. FINANCIAL&#160;STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS. &#160;&#160; &#160; 3 &#160; SIGNATURES &#160;&#160; &#160; 4 &#160; EXHIBIT 3.2 &#160;&#160; Table of Contents ITEM&#160;5.03. AMENDMENTS TO ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION OR BYLAWS; CHANGE IN FISCAL YEAR. On January 5, 2023, the Board of Directors of Amazon.com, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;)&#160;approved and adopted amendments to the Company&#8217;s Amended and Restated Bylaws (the &#8220;Bylaws&#8221;) to: (i)&#160;reflect recent amendments to, and align certain provisions with, the Delaware General Corporation Law; (ii)&#160;implement procedural and disclosure requirements for director nominees and shareholders proposing director nominees and other business for consideration at the Company&#8217;s annual or special meetings of shareholders, including to address the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission&#8217;s recently adopted &#8220;universal proxy card&#8221; rules; (iii)&#160;address the conduct of annual or special meetings of shareholders; and (iv)&#160;make technical and conforming revisions and clarifications. The foregoing summary of the amendments to the Bylaws does not purport to be complete and is qualified in its entirety by reference to the full text of the Bylaws, a copy of which is filed as Exhibit 3.2 hereto. &#160; ITEM&#160;9.01. FINANCIAL&#160;STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS. (d) Exhibits. &#160; Exhibit Number &#160;&#160; Description 3.2 &#160;&#160; Amended and Restated Bylaws of the Company. 104 &#160;&#160; The cover page from this Current Report on Form 8-K, formatted in Inline XBRL (included as Exhibit&#160;101). &#160; 3 Table of Contents SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; AMAZON.COM,&#160;INC. (REGISTRANT) &#160; &#160; By: &#160; /s/ David A. Zapolsky Dated: January 6, 2023 &#160; &#160; &#160; David A. Zapolsky &#160; &#160; &#160; Senior Vice President &#160; 4
